title: false reports #riothelpme
body:
I need to know something, if someone makes heaps of false reports to other players will that persons reports get ignored?

Riot plz help

replies.body:
They won't be ignored but they'll be taken less seriously. Also they might get a warning or punishment if they're really just spam reporting but that takes a ton of reports. 
If you're worried about getting banned based off false reports, it shouldn't happen, Riot usally can tell the difference between low skill and feeding/trolling.

Generally speaking, yes. Your report weight is reduced if you keep making false reports, and your reports may eventually do nothing.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4737274&page=13#post48926281
